Topic.Title: Verizon aided the government in tapping into AP reporters

Message.Msg: Couple of thoughts about the AP bugging. If the CIA and Justice were investigating leaks coming from the government to the media, wouldn't it have been more logical to bug the phones of anyone in government that had access to the information being leaked? I am sure in this age of technology, they should have been able to obtain the phone numbers of the local media staff's and program any government employee phones, even cell and home if a warrant was obtained to flag Justice when any of those numbers was dialed by people with access to sensitive information. They were trampling on the civil right of those in the media while the leak was coming from INSIDE the government! They had the investigation reversed!

We were promised something we never received , a trust from the president , a call to honesty perhaps a call to his commitment that he would be different ... but not realized in reality for he has lied to us ...his claims fall far from his promises ..he is but a politician and not a leader !!
